messages.subject: Car Talk Tom Magliozzi on Education
messages.msgSnippet: Here are some links that I just found that might be of interest to some. It s cool to see unschooling-type thoughts peeking out in the mainstream. Education:
messages.messageBody:
Here are some links that I just found that might be of interest to
some. It's cool to see unschooling-type thoughts peeking out in the
mainstream.



Education: The Learning of Skills We Will Never Need?
http://www.cartalk.com/content/features/ATC/
this might be good for newbies worried about math

The Education Forum
http://www.cartalk.com/content/features/ATC/Education/
what is an educated person?

The Education Forum Part II
http://www.cartalk.com/content/features/ATC/Education/index2.html
some responses received from the question posed in The Education
Forum


The New Theory of Learning
http://www.cartalk.com/content/features/ATC/Education/r-rlast15.html
well - this ain't "new" to us cutting edge unschoolers


Bio of Tom Magliozzi
http://www.cartalk.com/content/about/bios/tom-bio.html
a schooled life with an unschooling attitude?



Each of the articles has links that were fun to read as well.

Mercedes
looking forward to the LiveandLearn conference and being with people
who don't need these things explained over and over. . . .

http://www.liveandlearnconference.org/
